name: Plexu: The Time Travellers
overview: Plexu: The Time Travellers is 2D flip screen shoot em up platform game. The player controls Plexu - green-haired guy with special space suit, who must infiltrate the enemy stronghold. Game is pretty typical for its genre, the player moves right and shoots the various enemies on the road. The player character carries a gun that has unlimited ammo and fights against giant eyeballs, ghosts, fire snakes, alien skeletons, squids, bats and many other enemies. Giant bosses await at the end each level.
